abstract: A joint venture of Louis Dreyfus and a hedge fund owned by JPMorgan Chase has announced plans to sell an energy trading business to a group of investors, including Paul Tudor Jones.
snippet: A joint venture of Louis Dreyfus and a hedge fund owned by JPMorgan Chase has announced plans to sell an energy trading business to a group of investors, including Paul Tudor Jones.
lead_paragraph: Commodity traders have a new trade: themselves.

headline.main: Louis Dreyfus and JPMorgan to Sell Energy Trading Venture
